name: Wedding Nail Salon - Nail Makeover Games for Girl
name_original: Wedding Nail Salon - Nail Makeover Games for Girl
description:
Nail Salon Game is a free to play nail art games for girls

Well, you know a nice suit is to your body what a delicate manicure is to your fingers and Hand. So take the chance here to design your dream fingers and nail and make them happen!
Do you want to get remarkable nails like a princess of the Kingdom?
Polish, decorate, clip, buff your nails and much more in this amazing dress up and makeup nail Cutting and Washing Makeover game!

Manicure nails like a real nail salon! trimming your nails with realistic nail clippers, and buffing to a squeaky high shine. Then choose from loads of nail salon polish color collections to custom paint gorgeous nails.and Pattern Choose from absolutely tons of sparkling rhinestones, crystals, diamonds, gemstones, stickers, decals, hearts, Stone, Dimond and much much more to decorate your nails With Different Tattos.Because all girls like to play makeup games,
Imagine that you are the owner of one of the well known beauty makeup salon and your client is a beautiful princess abd her nail is looking nice.

Beauty Makeup and Nail Makeover Games features :

- your own beauty makeup salon with a lot of cosmetics
- a gorgeous nail makeover salon with everything you need for a perfect manicure
- easy to play, like all our makeup games
